
add_custom_command (
  OUTPUT  VAudioDeltaSigmaDac.cpp
          VAudioDeltaSigmaDac.h
          VAudioDeltaSigmaDac__Syms.cpp
          VAudioDeltaSigmaDac__Syms.h
          VAudioDeltaSigmaDac__Trace.cpp
          VAudioDeltaSigmaDac__Trace__Slow.cpp
  DEPENDS AudioDeltaSigmaDac.v
  COMMAND perl ${VERILATOR} ${VERILATOR_OPTS} -Mdir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR} -cc
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/AudioDeltaSigmaDac.v
)

# Verilog .v files are added here so that they get added to any IDE project generated by CMake.
add_library (VAudioDeltaSigmaDac STATIC
    VAudioDeltaSigmaDac.cpp
    VAudioDeltaSigmaDac__Syms.cpp
    VAudioDeltaSigmaDac__Trace.cpp
    VAudioDeltaSigmaDac__Trace__Slow.cpp
    AudioDeltaSigmaDac.v
)

target_compile_options(VAudioDeltaSigmaDac PRIVATE ${VK_CPPFLAGS})

target_include_directories(VAudioDeltaSigmaDac PUBLIC ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})

target_link_libraries(VAudioDeltaSigmaDac verilated)
